profile: We understand that renovations, of any kind, be it a bathroom renovation, kitchen renovation, basement renovation or a new addition, can be stressful. As a general contractor, EA Renovations will take the time to listen to what you want and deliver on it, while making sure your life isn't turned upside down in the process. *** We have brought together a highly skilled team of tradesmen and designers with well over 50 years of combined experience. So whether you need a new deck, a new kitchen, bathroom or an addition, we can get it done for you with the same care and attention that we would put into our own homes. Call now for a free consultation and written estimate!

profile:
Here at Volpe Renovations we pride ourselves in our years of experience in helping you make your home into the Beautiful; yet practical castle that you have always dreamed of!We offer fully custom Interior Renovations including Luxurious Bathrooms and Gorgeous Kitchens with all of the Cultured Stone & Wooden Interior Decor to match.

***

We have been serving the GVRD area for years now, whether it’s a total Interior Renovation or an Exterior Project to “Complete” the overall look of your home or business, you can be assured you are in good hands.The Team Here at Volpe Renovations also like to think a home or business should be Practical and more importantly: Safe! We Specialize in Assisted Living & Handicap Friendly Renovations including Handrail Installation & Safety/Accessibility Assessments for Businesses. We have some of the Best Suppliers in British Columbia and we can source any kind of custom material or asset you might want. You would be surprised at the variety of options we offer in comparison to any of our competition.

We're social here: 

https://www.instagram.com/volperenovations/

profile:
We offer an end-to-end client experience that includes seamless communication, budgeting, staffing, on-site organization, and solid, quality work every time. Our past projects include new luxury residential construction, renovations, restorations and commercial tenant improvements. Occupied and fully operational job sites are never a problem. And we can also plan, manage, and build multi-phase jobs. 

In order to succeed in the construction industry, a general contractor must integrate superior craftsmanship, experience, and dedication within the company’s culture. But a contractor is only as good as his team — and we are committed to hiring experienced professionals who share in our commitment to quality.

We believe that teamwork, integrity, honesty, and attention to detail each step of the way, makes the best construction environment for everyone — which ultimately leads to greater customer satisfaction.

profile:
At Vancouver General Contractors our mission is to provide our clients with an amazing experience in transforming their home into beautiful functional art that reflects the lifestyle they choose to lead. Vancouver General Contractors’ entire process is geared towards putting the customer first. Vancouver General Contractors’ Code of Business Practices ensures ethics and integrity are at the top of our priority list when serving our clients.  We offer a fixed price, and a two-year warranty on our work, so the customer knows we are working for them. We strive to educate the customer through the complexities of the construction industry and build process to ensure the customer realizes their dream and their budget!

We are an award winning company specializing in green-built projects, mobility accessibility, custom homes, additions and major renovations. Call us for a free onsite consultation and we will bring your vision to life!
